Question
========

Of a number of children, age was determined in months, and height in centimeters. The data are plotted in the attached scatterplot. The equation of the regression line is: height is 65 + 0.64 __________. age. The value 65 from the regression equation is called:

![](uva-regression-1268-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* Regression coefficient
* Coefficient of determination
* Intercept or axis cutoff
* Correlation coefficient

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Regression coefficient: Incorrect
* Coefficient of determination: Incorrect
* Intercept or axis cut-off: Correct
* Correlation coefficient: Incorrect
